singleItemContent: Is it difficult for you to stay focused on something?
When is it hard to concentrate?
What may distract you when you are trying to stay focused?
In what situations do you need to concentrate?
When do you need to be focused?
What do you do to improve concentration?
What do you do to help you concentrate?
Is it easy for you to do two things simultaneously?
Describe a time when you tried to do something but was not very successful
Why it was not very successful
And how you felt about it
What is your definition of success?
What things do children try to succeed in?
Which do you think is more important for people to become successful? Hard work and opportunities?
Do you think people will be happy if they don’t have any goals to achieve?
